#define mem(a,b) memset(a,b,sizeof(a))
using namespace std;
const int maxn=1e5+5,inf=1e9+7;

int main(void){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    ///for(int i=0;i<100;++i) cout<<use[i]<<' ';
    while(t--){
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        cout<<fixed<<setprecision(12)<<use[n]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
